  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.

  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. From the brand

Lighting has been deeply rooted in the soul of human . In the unity of function and form，lamps not only become masters of creating atmosphere, but also add artistic tone to the space.

EXF has always been endeavoring in the combination of bright and art.

“EXTRA FUN AND BEAUTY for your home decoration” is our design concept and goal. We hope your life will be accompanied by us all the time.

C9 Christmas lights

Solar string lights

Meteor shower lights

Christmas String Lights

【Widely Used Solar Lights Outdoor】: This starbright solar LED string lights is a great choice for Christmas, Wedding, Patio, Garden, Yard, Party, Fence, Porch, Xmas Tree, Roof and so on.
【Energy-Saving & High Efficiency】: This outdoor string lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility of electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. It can work up to 8~10 hours at night after fully charged under sunshine for 6~8 hours.
【8 Modes & Memory Function】: These solar mini lights have the ON/OFF button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button. And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it.
*NOTES*: 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged and light on automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location – not in a shady area – and the solar panel faces the sun. 3. If any question about order or product, please contact seller and we will respond in 24 hours.

Read more

EXF warm white solar Christmas lights are perfect for your celebrations outdoors or around your front yard, bring warmth to your home!

An Ideal decor for our outdoor living

With 2022 upgraded solar panel, the outdoor string lights will provide you a better experience of outdoor living. It is an ideal decor for the Christmas trees and fence and more.

Energy Saving & IP65 Waterproof

The solar LED string lights are powered by solar energy, this light will lights up automatically at night and off during the day, no utility energy costs. With its IP65 water resistance performance, it can work as usual even in rainy days when there is still power with the battery, no need to worry about short circuit due to moisture.

8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function

Our solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof have memory function and it will remember the last light setting mode and no need to press the ON/OFF button every day. You can press the button on the solar panel to select any lighting mode you like.

Read more

8 Brilliant Lighting Modes:

  • Combination
  • Waves
  • Sequential
  • Slow glow
  • Chasing/flash
  • Slow fade
  • Twinkle/flash
  • Steady-on

Specifications:

  • LED Color: Warm White
  • LED quantity: 100 LED * 4 = 400 LEDs
  • Switch: ON/OFF, MODE (8 Modes)
  • Charging time: 6-8 hours & Working time: 8 -10 hours
  • String light Length: 33ft * 4 =132ft
  • Wire Length to first LED: 1.5m/4.9ft
  • Space Between LEDs: 10cm/0.32ft
  • Battery: 800MAH Ni-MH rechargeable battery

Read more

HOW to use it?

  • Assemble the lights according to the IM;
  • Remove the protective clear film on the solar panel;
  • Cover the solar panel entirely and press the ON/OFF button, ensure it is at ON mode, then press MODE button to select your favorite lighting mode;
  • Find a place you would like to decorate, make sure the solar panel can be exposed to efficient direct sunshine, meanwhile, this place will not have bright light source at night;
  • Softten the earth with water and insert the ground spike into the earth;
  • Adjust the solar panel and make it face upwardly, tighten the screw, it will turn on at night and turn off at dawn automatically.

WHY it doesn’t work?

  • Please place the solar panel under direct sunshine to charge for one or 2 days and it should be able to turn on as usual.
  • Check the solar panel is ON, cover the complete solar panel. If the lights come on, the button is in the on position.
  • If the sun is not enough weather, or the temperature of the cold season, please charge more than a few days.

Any questions please feel freely to ask us, we will help you solve problem quickly.

4.5

From the brand

LUMIMAN Smart Life

LUMIMAN is a global innovator that bright new ideas to the lighting industry.

LUMIMAN Best Sellers

Smart Strips and Light Bars

【Energy Saving】Low Wattage, High Brightness, Environmentally friendly
【Sync to Music】Smart light bulb has 16 million colors, color changing with the music rhythm, a brilliant gift of Halloween and Christmas
【Voice Control】Works with Alexa, Echo dot and Google Assistant for voice control, no hub required. (e.g. ‘Alexa, set the bedroom to purple’)
【Remote Control】Group control multiple bulbs with PlusMinus APP whether you are home or away
【Customize Scenes】Every color is dimmable and tunable, bright enough, you can set your preference mode
【Schedule/Timer】Set timer if you always forget to turn off the color changing light bulb
【Easy to install】Follow step-by-step with instructions, you only need 30s to connect the LED bulbs. ★24/7 service online and worry-free 24-month warranty

LUMIMAN-Life is more than black and white.

Read more

Read more

Free PlusMinus App

Easy to use mobile app that works with Android and iOS devices.

Just download the app and connect to your home WiFi network.

  • iOS 9.0+
  • Android 5.0+
  • Quick and easy setup
  • Required WiFi 2.4GHz
  • No hub required

Smart WiFi LED Bulbs

Works with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa

Easily turn lights on/off, set groups or schedules. Customize light color or color temperature. The bulbs can be controlled with voice commands and an intuitive mobile app. Enjoy the management of your home lighting from any location or using your favorite smart home voice assistants.

  • Color changing / Tunable white
  • Voice control
  • Grouping
  • On/off and dim (with app or voice assistant)
  • Scheduling
  • Device sharing
  • Connect with AP mode if you are having challenges connecting our smart lights/bulbs to your router

Read more

Group control

All devices can be controlled individually or collectively, all light in the home can be adjusted. Smart devices make life easier.

Sync to Music

Lights react to the beats of your music, make the rhythm visible.

High color rendering index

High color rendering light bulbs are valuable in home use, they can keep the original color of the objects under lighting, and bring you a vivid home atmosphere.

Energy Saving

Compared with 60W general bulb, Lumiman light bulbs can save more than 90% energy but have same brightness. In addition, the LED lifespan of the bulb can up to 50,000 hours, it will last for years without needing to be replaced.

4.5

【Premium Quality Beanie】: Beanie hats for women are made of high quality, stretchy, soft-spun acrylic and polyester, extremely soft, cozy and comfortable. Our winter hats for women will give you lasting warmth and softness in cold weather. Plus, you can pull the cuff of womens beanies for winter down to cover your ears for added warmth.
【Satin Lining & Cute Pom Pom】: Wearing our satin lined beanie to provided extra care for your head and ears! Special customized satin lined design makes this cute beanie very easy to wear and take off, and it won’t mess up your hairstyle. Besides, the pom pom on the top of the women hat makes you look so cute. You can wear the pom pom beanie when you dress up casual and youth style outfit, you’ll look effortlessly stylish in this beanie.
【One Size Fits Most】: The hat width of Our winter beanies for women is about 17cm/6.7″, height is about 20cm/7.9″ before stretched. The beanie for women is one size with good elasticity, making slouchy beanie hat fully adjustable.
【Beanie For Wide Occasions】: Simple style design, trendy, generous and cute beanie almost fit all of your clothes in the winter. This knit hat fits to most occasions in our daily life, you can choose the favorite colors of the beanie to go with your clothes, making you feel fashionable and confident. Or this sown hat can be used as ski cap, which is suitable for many outdoor sports activities like go skiing, snowboarding, sledding, ice skating and more.
【Great Gift】: Our womens beanie is the perfect gift for for birthday, Halloween, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas and more, which is the perfect gift for yourself, friends, family or loved ones.
